summary: This mod is an appearance preset for Shaydows Vampire Overhaul V2.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the Vampire Lord transformation to look less brutish using Shaydows VampireLord Overhaul as a base.

[b]Notice[/b]: This mod requires files from Loverslab.


Installation Instructions:

1. Download and manually install Shaydows VampireLord Overhaul.
2. Choose one main file and install - Overwrite/merge everything.

Body/Textures used are UNP-based

Common issues:
1. Potato head after transforming into a Vampire Lord.
   Fix: Use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] to import a face while you are a Vampire Lord, or try the fix outlined in the readme file.
2. Disfigured Vampire Lord after transforming.
   Fix: Revert and try transforming again.
3. Too skimpy/not skimpy enough.
   Fix: You can rename and swap meshes/textures from your favorite outfit to personally customize the body


Join our discord server for mod info and upcoming changes [url=https://discord.gg/XZVUmAe]https://discord.gg/XZVUmAe[/url]

Credits:
